member.name: T:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM
member.summary: Discrete element modeling. Calculates derivatives of n particle-spring model into a 6n space-state system (positions, velocities, x,y,z each).

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.KernelcalcL0
member.summary: Initial lengths kernel. work_dim = 1, globalsize = n

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.KernelcalcForces
member.summary: Calculate forces kernel. work_dim = 1, globalsize = L

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.KernelcalcGroundForces
member.summary: Calculate forces kernel. work_dim = 1, globalsize = n

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.Kernelderivs
member.summary: Calculate forces kernel. work_dim = 1, globalsize = L

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.KernelcalcNodesConnections
member.summary: Calculate nodes connections. work_dim = 1, globalsize = n

member.name: M:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single[],System.Single[],System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Single[],System.Single[],System.Single[],System.Single[])
member.param: Number of masses in the system
Position and velocity of vertexes [2*3*i] - posx, [2*(3*i+1)] - posy, [2*(3*i+2)] - posz, [1+2*3*i] - velx, [1+2*(3*i+1)] - vely, [1+2*(3*i+2)] - velz
Origin vertex of connections. Spring connects Origin[i] to Dests[i]
Destination vertex of connections. Spring connects Origin[i] to Dests[i]
Spring constant for each mass, connecting to ground (nMass)
Absolute damping proportional to speed relative to Earth (nMass)

member.name: M:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.derivs(OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.Program.Variable,OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.Program.Variable,OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.Program.Variable)
member.summary: Calculates derivatives of deformable body space-state vector dydx[6n]. dydx[2i] - i-th position deriv, dydx[2i+1] - ith velocity deriv

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.DEMSource.floatcalcForces
member.summary: Forces calculation. Returns forces. Work_dim = 1, nmax = { nConnections }

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.DEMSource.floatcalcGroundForces
member.summary: Calculates forces to ground. w_dim=1, global_work_size = nMasses

member.name: F:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.floatDEM.DEMSource.floatcalcNodesConnections
member.summary: Calculates forces to ground. w_dim=1, global_work_size = nMasses

member.name: T:OpenCLTemplate.CLCalc.CLPrograms.MinDifs
member.summary: Minimum differences - makes matrix of shifted differences of vectors

member.summary: Force applier to particles. Kernels: ResetForces, ApplyGravity, FloorCollision

member.summary: Collision applier to particles. Kernels: ResetForces, ApplyGravity, FloorCollision

member.summary: Initializes physics program. Components indexes: [i] - x, [i+1] - y, [i+2] - z

member.name: T:LinearAlgebra.Matrix
member.summary: Creates a Matrix of real numbers.

member.name: F:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.LINALGMAXERROR
member.summary: Linear Solve parameter. Maximum mean error allowable to linear solve method.

member.name: F:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.LIMITITERS
member.summary: Linear Solve parameter. Limit linear solution correction iterations.

member.name: F:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.IGNOREHARDSINGULARITY
member.summary: Linear Solve parameter. Should the solution method halt if a hard singulariry is found in matrix?

member.name: F:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.IGNORENULLDETERMINANT
member.summary: Linear Solve parameter. Should the method ignore if the matrix has a close-to-zero determinant and keep solving?

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.#ctor(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Constructor. Creates matrix from existing items.
member.param: Matrix items to create matrix from.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor. Creates empty matrix with specified dimensions.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.op_Multiply(LinearAlgebra.Matrix,LinearAlgebra.Matrix)
member.summary: Matrix multiplication. Notice that m1 rows should be the same as m2 lines for compatibility.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.op_Multiply(LinearAlgebra.Matrix,System.Double[])
member.summary: Matrix post-vector multiplication. Notice that a vector is a [1,Cols] matrix which means vector length should be equal matrix number of columns.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.op_Multiply(System.Double[],LinearAlgebra.Matrix)
member.summary: Matrix pre-vector multiplication. Notice that a vector is a [1,Cols] matrix which means vector length should be equal matrix number of lines.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.op_Division(LinearAlgebra.Matrix,System.Double)
member.param: Scalar to divide each element of matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Equals(LinearAlgebra.Matrix)
member.summary: Compares matrixes and returns true if they are identical.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.MultiplyElementWise(LinearAlgebra.Matrix)
member.summary: Element-wise product. This is not regular matrix product. It multiplies elements at corresponding positions.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.NormEuclidean
member.summary: Returns Euclidean norm of the matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.InvertElements
member.summary: Element-wise inversion. Returns the matrix with each element (x) inverted (1/x).

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.LUDecomp
member.summary: Creates internal LU factorization of this matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.LinearSolve(System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns the solution x to the linear system Ax=b, A being this matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Determinant
member.summary: Returns the determinant of this matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.Inversa
member.summary: Returns the inverse of this matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.IdentifyParameters(System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns the solution x to the linear system A'Ax=A'b, A being this matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.IdentifyParametersWeighted(System.Double[],LinearAlgebra.Matrix)
member.summary: Returns the weighted solution x to the linear system A'WAx=A'Wb, A being this matrix. TO DO: Correct quality check

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.IdentifyParametersWeighted(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Returns the weighted solution x to the linear system A'DAx=A'Db, A being this matrix. D is a diagonal weight matrix.
member.param: Main diagonal elements of diagonal weight matrix D.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.CheckQuality(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculates R, corrected R and Quadratic Error for the trySolution x to the linear system A'Ax=A'b, A being this matrix.
member.param: Solution to use to evaluate quality indexers.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.GramSchmidt
member.summary: Applies the Gram-Schmidt orthonormalization method to this matrix, replacing it by the orthonormalized matrix.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.GramSchmidt(System.Double[]@)
member.summary: Applies the Gram-Schmidt orthonormalization method to this matrix, replacing it by the orthonormalized matrix and also correcting right-hand Y values for a linear system solve.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.GramSchmidt(System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Double[]@)
member.summary: Applies the Gram-Schmidt orthonormalization method to this matrix using a pre-set order of normalization. Replaces current matrix by the orthonormalized matrix and also correcting right-hand Y values for a linear system solve.
member.param: Line order to apply the orthonormalization method.
Starts orthonormalization from line lineOrder[indStart]. Assumes previous lines are already normalized.

member.name: M:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representing this matrix.

member.name: P:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.rowCount
member.summary: Gets the number of rows in this matrix.

member.name: P:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.colCount
member.summary: Gets the number of columns in this matrix.

member.name: P:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.RSquareIndex
member.summary: Returns the R index of last fit.

member.name: P:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.RSquareCorrectedIndex
member.summary: Returns corrected R index of last fit.

member.name: P:LinearAlgebra.Matrix.QuadraticError
